messages.content: You are an expert at analyzing customer feedback and identifying actionable insights.

Analyze customer feedback for "01. Initial motivators" from Wattbike.

Sample: 98 responses from 946 total.

RESPONSES:
1. "COVID"
2. "Weather 😡"
3. "Poor British weather!"
4. "Hip injury meaning I couldn't run"
5. "Not wanting to use road bike indoors"
6. "I NEEDED A MORE RELIABLE EXERCISE BIKE"
7. "Bored of a static bike with nothing to watch"
8. "Just didn't fancy another winter season on the roads."
9. "Poor turbo experience and poor data gathering from turbo"
10. "Because they never maintain the wattbikes at the David Lloyd gym"
11. "New baby = less opportunity to exercise outside and wanted to keep fit"
12. "physical injury with my heel, and in my past life, I had two road racing bikes."
13. "Bought a new outdoor road bike and did not want to attach it to an indoor smart trainer"
14. "Bad weather cycle training and for other family members to use, who aren't happy/confident on open roads"
15. "I am unfit and used to be sporty. I needed focus. My road bike broke on the turbo so I had to replace the exercise method."
16. "Zwift"
17. "The winter"
18. "Winter weather"
19. "Winter training"
20. "Winter training"
21. "Winter training."
22. "Used before at gym."
23. "Better turbo sessions"
24. "To improve my training."
25. "Using watt bike at the gym"
26. "Winter/bad weather training"
27. "Winter and lunchtime training"
28. "Previous indoor cycling sessions"
29. "Wanted to replace my smart trainer"
30. "I wanted a better quality indoor bike"
31. "To keep fit and reduce running injuries"
32. "After using turbo trainer during lockdown"
33. "Replacing cheaper spin bike during lockdown"
34. "Fitness during lockdown and inclement weather"
35. "Wanted a smart bike to connect to fitness apps"
36. "Needed new trainer and two friends have Wattbike"
37. "The need to stay cycle fit in winter, during Covid"
38. "Recommendation from friends and the need to get fit"
39. "Replacing older spinning bike and wanting a smart bike"
40. "Remove the barriers to exercise. Make it easy to train."
41. "Help with winter training  Structured training programmes"
42. "Wanted a specific indoor trainer that would work with Zwift."
43. "To train at any time and follow workouts to improve fitness etc."
44. "I wanted a stand alone smart bike which also went well with Zwift"
45. "Wanted the best on the market to exercise at home rather than the gym"
46. "Winter training, dark evenings etc. More capable than bike based systems."
47. "Wanted a smart trainer to use Zwift without having to hook up an actual bike"
48. "Training during the winter season for outdoor rides, when my spin gym had closed"
49. "Footprint of the bike compared to my previous setup (tacx flux 2 with bike attached)"
50. "Wanted to train during winter and when I didn't have enough time to go out on my bike"

Provide:
1. Summary (2-3 sentences)
2. 3-5 key insights
